name: Comprehensive Perinatal Services Program (CPSP)
description: The Comprehensive Perinatal Services Program provides enhanced prenatal and postpartum care to Medi-Cal recipients, offering additional support services beyond standard obstetric care to improve birth outcomes.
fullDescription: The Comprehensive Perinatal Services Program provides enhanced prenatal and postpartum care to Medi-Cal recipients, offering additional support services beyond standard obstetric care to improve birth outcomes.
whatTheyOffer:
- Enhanced prenatal care visits
- Nutrition counseling and education
- Psychosocial assessment and support
- Health education classes
- Care coordination
- Postpartum care through 60 days after delivery
- Breastfeeding support
- Referrals to community resources
howToGetIt: If you're pregnant and have Medi-Cal, ask your prenatal care provider if they're a CPSP provider. CPSP services are covered at no additional cost through Medi-Cal.
